SELECT r.relation_id, r.requester_id, requester.user_nickname AS requesterNickname, r.receiver_id, receiver.user_nickname AS receiverNickname, r.relation_status, r.accepted_at FROM tb_relation r JOIN tb_user requester ON r.requester_id = requester.user_id JOIN tb_user receiver ON r.receiver_id = receiver.user_id ORDER BY r.relation_id DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_relation r WHERE (r.receiver_id = #{userId} OR r.requester_id = #{userId})
AND r.relation_status = #{relationStatus}
